content: PAN Card ‚Äì Complete Short Information Point Short Information What is PAN Card PAN is a permanent identification number used for income tax and financial transactions Full Form of PAN Permanent Account Number Issuing Authority Income Tax Department, Government of India PAN Number Format 10-character alphanumeric code (Example: AAAAA1234A) Fourth Character Meaning P-Individual, C-Company, F-Firm, H-HUF, T-Trust PAN Card Validity PAN is valid for lifetime Who Can Apply Individual, Company, Firm, Trust, HUF Modes of Application Online and Offline PAN Card Verification PAN number can be verified online PAN Active / Inactive Status PAN becomes inactive if not linked with Aadhaar PAN and Aadhaar Linking Linking PAN with Aadhaar is mandatory e-PAN Digital PAN card available in PDF format Time Required to Get PAN e-PAN: Few minutes | Physical PAN: 7‚Äì15 working days Types of PAN Card Individual PAN, Company PAN, Firm PAN, Trust PAN, HUF PAN PAN Card Uses ITR filing, banking, property, vehicle, investment, business PAN Card and Job Required for salary account, TDS and Form 16 PAN Card and Business Mandatory for GST registration and tax filing Minor PAN Card PAN can be issued to individuals below 18 years Minor PAN Update Correction is required after attaining 18 years of age PAN Card Correction Name, DOB, photo, signature and address can be corrected multiple times PAN Number Change PAN number never changes PAN Card Lost Reprint PAN can be applied with the same PAN number Multiple PAN Cards Holding more than one PAN is illegal PAN Card Fraud Prevention Write ‚ÄúFor KYC Purpose Only‚Äù on PAN photocopies Structure of PAN Card Number Part Description PAN Format AAAAA1234A First Three Letters Alphabetic characters based on a predefined pattern Fourth Letter Indicates PAN holder category (P-Individual, H-HUF, C-Company, F-Firm, A-AOP, T-Trust) Fifth Letter First letter of the PAN holder‚Äôs surname Next Four Digits Numeric characters from 0 to 9 Last Letter Check digit used for PAN validation Uses of PAN Card Purpose Use of PAN Card Income Tax For filing Income Tax Return (ITR) Banking For opening savings and current bank accounts Cash Transaction For cash transactions above ‚Çπ10,000 Fixed Deposit For opening Fixed Deposit (FD) Property For buying or selling immovable property Vehicle Purchase For purchasing a car or any motor vehicle Investment For opening Demat account and share market investment Foreign Travel For obtaining foreign exchange for overseas travel Employment For salary account, TDS deduction and Form 16 Loans & Credit For applying loans and credit cards Business For GST registration and business tax filing Insurance For high-value insurance policies KYC For KYC verification in financial institutions Government Work For government tenders and official contracts
title: PAN Card - New PAN, Correction, e-PAN Download & Status Check
